summary: Completed testing of Servex Holdings multi-tenant logistics SaaS platform. Backend API authentication and protected endpoints working correctly. Frontend loading and Google authentication integration working perfectly. Identified routing configuration issue where /health and / endpoints not externally accessible.

critical_bugs.issue: Backend root and health endpoints not accessible via external URL - returns frontend HTML instead of API response
critical_bugs.impact: Health monitoring and API root access not available externally
critical_bugs.root_cause: Kubernetes ingress configuration only routes /api/* paths to backend, other paths go to frontend
critical_bugs.workaround: Use /api/auth/me or other /api endpoints to verify backend health

passed_tests: Servex Holdings branding and content visible
Sign In with Google button present and clickable
Google authentication redirects to correct Emergent auth URL
AuthContext.jsx contains correct Emergent auth URL configuration
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Kubernetes ingress configuration to properly route /health and / endpoints to backend. Currently only /api/* paths are routed to backend (port 8001), while all other paths go to frontend (port 3000). Backend is running correctly on localhost:8001 but not externally accessible for non-API routes.

success_percentage.backend: 67% - API endpoints working, routing config issue for root/health endpoints

infrastructure_notes.routing_issue: Ingress only routes /api/* to backend, everything else to frontend
infrastructure_notes.auth_integration: Working - frontend correctly redirects to auth.emergentagent.com
